original: Jonson, Sven, konstnär, Halmstad, f. 28/9/02 i Halmstad av Karl J. o. Elina Svensson. G. 34 m. Brita Svensson. Barn: Bo Germund f. 37, Torbjörn 47. — Stud. v. Carl Wilhelmsons målarsk. i Sthlm 25 o. v. Académie Scandinave i Paris 26-27. Utf. intarsia i Halmstads rådhus. Repr. i Nat :mus. samt i mus. i Gbg, Malmö, Norrköp., Borås, Gävle o. Halmstad. Sep :utställn. h. Färg o. Form i Sthlm 38, Gummesons konsthall där 43, Nermans- konsthall i Norrköp. 45, delt. i utställn. i London 37, Oslo 47, Helsingfors 34 o. 45, Köpenhamn 3i5 o. 42, Sthlm 30, 34, 39, 40 o. 44, Gbg 39. Medl. av Halmstadgruppen.
translated: Jonson, Sven, artist, Halmstad, born on September 28th, 1902 in Halmstad to Karl J. and Elina Svensson. Married in 1934 to Brita Svensson. Children: Bo Germund born in 1937, Torbjörn born in 1947. Studied at Carl Wilhelmson's painting school in Stockholm in 1925 and at the Académie Scandinave in Paris from 1926-1927. Executed intarsia in Halmstad's town hall. Represented in the National Museum, as well as in museums in Gothenburg, Malmö, Norrköping, Borås, Gävle, and Halmstad. Had solo exhibitions at the Färg o. Form in Stockholm in 1938, at Gummesons konsthall in 1943, at Nermans-konsthall in Norrköping in 1945, and participated in exhibitions in London in 1937, Oslo in 1947, Helsinki in 1934 and 1945, Copenhagen in 1935 and 1942, and Stockholm in 1930, 1934, 1939, 1940 and 1944, as well as in Gothenburg in 1939. Member of the Halmstad group.

exhibitions.name: Solo exhibition at Färg o. Form
